meanings.definition: The quality of being intrepid or fearless.
meanings.sent1: Her intrepidnesses in facing challenges inspired others to be brave.
meanings.sent2: His intrepidnesses during the rescue mission saved many lives.
meanings.sent3: The cat's intrepidnesses in chasing a mouse made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The intrepidnesses of the mountain climber reached new heights.
meanings.sent5: The intrepidnesses of the firefighter rushing into the burning building was truly heroic.

meanings.definition: The state of being intrepid or courageous.
meanings.sent1: The intrepidnesses of the soldier in battle was commendable.
meanings.sent2: Their intrepidnesses in the face of danger never wavered.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's intrepidnesses in stealing nuts from the bird feeder was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The intrepidnesses of the marathon runner crossing the finish line was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's intrepidnesses in the uncharted jungle was legendary.
